transcript.text: Shalom Shalom mrs. Daniel John Lee with
tor restoration ministries it is now
Thursday night
September the 28th 2017 the ninth day of
the seventh year month has begun
literally the eve now of Yom Kippur
which begins tomorrow night the same
time that the weekly Shabbat begins this
year Friday night tomorrow night Yom
Kippur will begin and Cornerstone
Baptist Church down in Salem Baptist
congregation they they regularly meet on
Thursdays for a prayer meeting to pray
for the upcoming Shabbat service and so
there were seven of us who gather
together in the in the fellowship hall
to pray myself and the pastor's wife and
the wife of an elder that was there and
then two other ladies and then of course
Yahshua of Nazareth showed up because he
said where two or more gathered together
in my name I will also be and he was
definitely there and as we began to pray
and lift up our intercessions and and
pleadings and really praying for a
revival a lot of us did his spirit just
descended in such a powerful way I can't
even begin to describe it and we all
felt it I mean it was just it was just
like he was right there and and the
pastor at one point he was just I mean
there were tears in his voice he was
crying out for revival crying out from
the depths of his heart and and it so
touched me because I have been so long
to see a pastor who has you know his own
building and has the congregation cry
out for that because I think that's what
yacht's art is and so you know the
scripture says do not despise the day of
small beginnings and though there were
only six of us seven including Yahshua's
presence there just a small group of us
the prayers were so heartfelt and so
broken and so just amazing and his
spirit just fell so powerfully I mean it
was just it was unbelievable you could
just feel the blink of his spirit so I
believe that since we did cry out in
unity for revival and that it would
start with us
you know that's that's when revival
happens if you look at history when the
church when the people of yah when they
break up their hearts and
break up their fallow ground and repent
and and get pure that's when revival
happens and so I'm expecting revival now
to really ramp up I think I'm expecting
some great things for this yom kippur
day of atonement service at Cornerstone
and it's exciting because I've been so
praying for this so although it was very
small tonight his presence was so huge
so amazing so thick and I believe I can
say with confidence that it's finally
happening yah is finally sending a
revival to the Pacific Northwest and I
think we're gonna get one final harvest
year before the end hallelujah
this is Daniel John Lee with tor
restoration ministries website is WWE
and tour accom
may you all have a very blessed Yom
Kippur starting tomorrow night Shalom
